articles.title: U.S. "Human Rights" Ballad Will Never Work on DPRK: DPRK FM Spokesman
articles.content:
U.S. "Human Rights" Ballad Will Never Work on DPRK: DPRK FM Spokesman
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK issued the following statement on Tuesday:
					 Recently the U.S. released the "2012 report on human rights" in which it malignantly slandered the DPRK.
					
					 It is unbecoming for the U.S. to style itself a "human rights judge" though it is the biggest human rights abuser that killed innocent people and caused untold disasters in all parts of the world through aggression and interference.
					
					 The U.S. stages the farce of evaluating the human rights performance in more than 190 countries of the world every year, which is aimed to invent a pretext for putting pressure on those countries disobedient to it and toppling them.
					
					 The U.S. works out the "human rights report" with countries' obedience to its strategy for dominating the world as a criterion. So those countries aspiring after independence have become target of the U.S. accusations and attacks without exception.
					
					 The U.S. "human rights report" is a tool for aggression and interference to overturn the social systems of anti-U.S. independent countries. Herein lie its reactionary nature and danger.
					
					  It is a trite method of the U.S. to charge with "human rights abuses" those countries with which it is displeased and interfere in their internal affairs with persistent "human rights" ballad and thus cultivate dishonest forces.
					
					 The U.S. employed this method when bringing down socialist system in the former Soviet Union and Eastern European countries during the Cold War and also when overturning different countries in the Mideast and North Africa recently.
					
					 Finding it difficult to topple down the DPRK by force of arms, the U.S. is now resorting to such a base method.
					
					 As a result, the U.S. "human rights" ballad is nothing but a conspiratorial means to realize its hostile policy toward the DPRK to topple down its socialist system chosen by the Korean people.
					
					 Such ballad will never work on the Korean-style socialist society in which all the service personnel and people are single-mindedly united around the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, a country which is possessed of modern nuclear deterrent for self-defence.
					
					 The more undisguisedly the U.S. escalates its hostile policy toward the DPRK aimed at bringing down its social system, the further the DPRK will bolster its nuclear deterrent to defend its social system and will thoroughly shatter the U.S. "human rights" ballad its own way.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il Meets Delegation of European Politicians
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il Meets Delegation of European Politicians
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Tuesday met and had a talk with the delegation of politicians from various political parties of Europe headed by Chief Executive Officer of Inter Mediate Jonathan Powell, former Downing Street Chief of Staff to Prime Minister Tony Blair.

articles.title: Delegation of European Politicians Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Delegation of European Politicians Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- A delegation of politicians from various political parties of Europe headed by Chief Executive Officer of Inter Mediate Jonathan Powell, former Downing Street Chief of Staff to Prime Minister Tony Blair, Tuesday visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun. 
					 The members of the delegation paid high tribute in humblest reverence to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il who performed the great feats for the era and humankind and made immortal contribution to global independence.
					
					 They entered the halls of immortality where Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They went round the halls where the orders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il received are on display and the halls which house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them in their field guidance and foreign trips till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Delegation of Politicians from Various Political Parties of Europe Feted
articles.content:
Delegation of Politicians from Various Political Parties of Europe Feted
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea gave a reception at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel Tuesday in honor of the visiting delegation of politicians from various political parties of Europe.
					 Present there on invitation were the members of the delegation headed by Chief Executive Officer of Inter Mediate Jonathan Powell, former Downing Street Chief of Staff to Prime Minister Tony Blair.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Il, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, Ri Jong Hyok, chairman of the DPRK-EU Friendship Parliamentary Group, and officials of the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letters to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letters to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un was presented with a floral basket and a congratulatory letter by the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the 81st anniversary of the founding of the Korean People's Army.
					 Hassan Reza Husseini, military attache of the Iranian embassy who is a doyen of the military attaches corps, conveyed the floral basket and the congratulatory letter to KPA General Kim Kyok Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, on Tuesday.
					
					 Congratulatory letters to Kim Jong Un from military attaches of the Iranian, Russian, Vietnamese, Cuban and Egyptian embassies and the military, naval and air attache of the Chinese embassy were respectively handed over to an official concerned.

articles.title: U.S. Misjudgment Will Entail Its Historical Defeat: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
U.S. Misjudgment Will Entail Its Historical Defeat: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Lately, the U.S. has blamed the present grim situation on the Korean Peninsula on the DPRK, opt-repeating the latter's "dangerous misjudgment" and "heedless action".
					 The U.S. is blustering that its proposal for dialogue reflects the demand of the region and the international community as it is aimed to prevent the catastrophic results to be entailed by the DPRK.
					
					 In other words, it means that the U.S. has opted for putting the situation under control as the toughest countermeasures taken by the DPRK are "reckless ones" caused by its wrong view on the present trend of the times.
					
					 This is nothing but a sinister scheme of the U.S. to stir up the atmosphere of pressure upon the DPRK and evade the responsibilities for the situation on the peninsula by highlighting the DPRK's "bellicose nature".
					
					 The U.S. is mistaken, however. The U.S. present policy toward the DPRK has derived from its extreme ignorance and miscalculation of the changed relations of political and military forces on the peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. is ignorant of the single-minded unity of the army and people of the DPRK around their leader and its might.
					
					 The U.S. thinks that it can undermine the social system of the DPRK through invasion against it accompanied by nuclear blackmail, ideological and cultural poisoning and economic sanctions aimed at "undermining it from within".
					
					 This U.S. foreign policy may work on other countries but never on the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK has turned into a full-fledged political and military power under the banner of independence and Songun and the Korean people are demonstrating their dignity as independent people no one dares provoke. 
					
					 Moreover, it has rich experiences and historical tradition of winning only victories in confrontation with the U.S.
					
					 The Korean Peninsula is not what it used to be in the past. The geographic position of the country remains as same as before but it is not a weak country which was ruthlessly trampled down by big powers as a theatre for their power scramble. 
					
					 The DPRK's possession of nuclear weapons has totally changed the balance of political and military forces in the peninsula and the region. This has put an end to the imbalance of nuclear force in Northeast Asia including the peninsula and decreased the danger of the outbreak of a war in effect.
					
					  The DPRK is now in a position to take any physical counteraction positively on its own initiatives to guarantee peace and security on the peninsula.
					
					  In contrast to it, the present U.S. Korea policy is anachronistic. This policy was shaped in the period before the DPRK's access to nukes and there is no change to speak of in its essence as well as means and method.
					
					 It is just the tragedy of the U.S. that it is unaware of the DPRK and unable to follow up the changed objective situation.
					
					 The U.S. had better roll back its stereotyped hostile policy toward the DPRK, though belatedly.
					
					 The U.S. misjudgment will lead it to its biggest historical defeat.
					
					 The present U.S. administration should be serious about the lesson drawn by its predecessors who said the Korean war in the 1950s was a war of mistake that was fought in a wrong place at a wrong time against wrong opponent.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Give Clear Answer to Just Demand of DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Give Clear Answer to Just Demand of DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The United States should take a practical step to meet the just demand raised by the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK in its statement, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a by-lined article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. and its allies set groundless preconditions for "dialogue" with the DPRK in a bid to gain propaganda effect.
					
					 They try to pass the buck for the grave war-like situation on the Korean Peninsula to the DPRK. They have forced the DPRK to show its will of nuclear dismantlement and suspension of missile launches which is totally unacceptable. This reminds one of a thief crying "Stop the thief". Such a thing can be done only by idiots.
					
					  If the DPRK sits at a table with the U.S., it has to be a dialogue between nuclear weapons states, not a place one side forcing the other to dismantle nuclear weapons. 
					
					 The U.S. appears to seek to force the DPRK to accept its demand at sort of the nuclear talks after introducing nuclear war means into the peninsula and overpowering the DPRK. This is a fairy tale-like story.
					
					 The U.S. should understand that a dialogue will begin only when the DPRK's demand for the withdrawal of strategic offensive means in the vicinity of the peninsula aimed at realizing the U.S. world domination strategy is met.
					
					 It is the U.S. sinister intention to force the DPRK to dismantle its nuclear program and make a preemptive nuclear strike at it in a bid to attain the aggression purpose.
					
					 The U.S. is sadly mistaken if it calculates it can deceive and mock at the international community and disarm the DPRK with such call as "dialogue".

articles.title: Dialogue and Confrontation Can Not Go Together: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Dialogue and Confrontation Can Not Go Together: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are claimed that the north rejected the proposal for dialogue made by them, distorting the fact with such outcries as "regret" and "insincerity". They went the lengths of blaring that the "north threw wet blanket over the proposal" and "it overturned table", while crying out for any "correct option".
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is a shameless ploy to shift the blame for the grave situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula on to the DPRK.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet warmongers who created the danger of a nuclear war on the peninsula.
					
					 North-south dialogue is impossible as the south Korean puppet forces are getting hell-bent on the "sanctions" and war maneuvers against the DPRK, while hurting the dignity of its supreme leadership.
					
					 They are chiming in the U.S. which set "observation of international duty" and "denuclearization" as preconditions for dialogue. This is an unpardonable insult to the DPRK and an open denial of the dialogue itself.
					
					 The south Korean authorities' talk about "dialogue" has not stemmed from the change of their real intention and any good-neighborliness toward the DPRK. They are resorting to "sanctions" and military threats to the DPRK in league with the U.S. When their moves did not get their way, they have misled the public opinion as if they were interested in the detente and peace on the Korean Peninsula while calling for "dialogue".
					
					 This is, in essence, another racket for confrontation under the signboard of "dialogue". The "dialogue" touted by the puppet forces is nothing but a crafty ploy to violate the independent right of the DPRK they failed to do through confrontation racket, and obliterate the dignified socialist system with dialogue as a bargaining chip.
					
					 Dialogue and racket for confrontation with the DPRK can never go together.

articles.title: Top Prize Awarded to Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia
articles.content:
Top Prize Awarded to Kimilsungia, Kimjongilia
						
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Gold prize (top prize) and its diploma of the 11th China Azalea Show were awarded to Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia with due ceremony in Jinggangshan City, Jiangxi Province of China on April 19.
					 The president of the Azalea Branch of the China Flower Association handed them to the head of the delegation of the Korea Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee.

articles.title: Agricultural Workers Give Performance on KPA Anniversary
articles.content:
Agricultural Workers Give Performance on KPA Anniversary
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The art squad of the Central Committee of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea gave a performance at the Hall of Culture of the Unha Co-op Farm, Unjon County, North Phyongan Province on Tuesday on the occasion of the 81st anniversary of the founding of the Korean People's Army.
					 The audience included Ri Myong Gil, chairman of the C.C., the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea, officials concerned and the agricultural workers of the farm.
					
					 The performance began with narration and chorus "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung" and "Song of the Korean People's Army".
					
					 Put on the stage were numbers like brass duet "Our General Is the Best", collection of songs "Off We Go, Brindled Ox" and "Rice Mill on Jikdong Pass for Victory".
					
					 They sang high praises of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who set a brilliant example in building the revolutionary armed forces in the era of independence by covering the thorny untrodden path of the Songun revolution and provided powerful military capabilities for the national prosperity and happiness of all generations.

articles.title: Meeting with DPRK Hero Held
articles.content:
Meeting with DPRK Hero Held
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- A meeting with a hero of the DPRK was organized at the Central Hall of Workers on Tuesday to celebrate the 81st anniversary of the founding of the Korean People's Army.
					 Present there were trade union officials and members and workers.
					
					 DPRK Hero Kim Sung Un, lecturer of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, made an address.
					
					 He said that KPA fighters humbled the pride of the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world and honorably defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country by giving full play to the matchless bravery and self-sacrificing spirit under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung during the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 The powerful revolutionary Paektusan army, which has grown under the leadership of the peerlessly brilliant Songun commanders, is giving fullest play to its invincible might as it is led by Supreme Commander Marshal Kim Jong Un, he noted.
					
					 He called for waging a dynamic struggle to thoroughly implement the Workers' Party of Korea's line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and building of nuclear force and thus consolidating the national power of Songun Korea and making a tangible contribution to bringing earlier the final victory of the Juche revolution.

articles.title: Reception Given for Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Reception Given for Military Attaches Corps
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of the People's Armed Forces gave a reception Tuesday on the occasion of the 81st anniversary of the founding of the Korean People's Army.
					 Present there on invitation were the members of the military attaches corps here and foreign diplomatic envoys from different countries.
					
					 Present there were KPA General Kim Kyok Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, and KPA generals and officers.

articles.title: Ministry of People's Armed Forces Gives Film Show
articles.content:
Ministry of People's Armed Forces Gives Film Show
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of the People's Armed Forces gave a film show in honor of the military attaches corps here Tuesday to mark the 81st anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 The participants watched the Korean documentary film "Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Work of the People's Army" dated January and February, Juche 102 (2013).
					
					 The film documents Kim Jong Un making ceaseless inspection of KPA units to resolutely foil the U.S. imperialists' increased moves to stifle the DPRK, demonstrating the invincible defence capabilities.

articles.title: People's Delegations Visit KPA Units
articles.content:
People's Delegations Visit KPA Units
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The people's delegations visited units of the Korean People's Army to mark the 81st anniversary of the KPA.
					 As they arrived at the units, service personnel and families of KPA servicemen welcomed them with warm clapping of hands.
					
					 Gifts sent by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un were conveyed to the service personnel.
					
					 Watching a-match-for-a hundred soldiers firmly standing guard over the outpost line of the country, the members of the delegations once again realized that the bright future of Kim Il Sung's Korea is being guaranteed thanks to the heroic KPA which developed into the strongest and boldest revolutionary army under the care of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They introduced the news of the people in the rear and handed over aid materials to the soldiers.
					
					 They requested the soldiers to become dependable ones who would defend the Supreme Commander, the country and the people at the risk of their lives.
					
					 The visitors looked round an education room and quarter, dining room, stock farm, green house and so on.
					
					 They played sports and games and sang songs with soldiers.

articles.title: April North-South Joint Conference, Model of Great National Unity
articles.content:
April North-South Joint Conference, Model of Great National Unity 
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- It has been 65 years after the April Joint Conference of Representatives of Political Parties and Public Organizations in North and South Korea, recorded as a significant event in the Korean nation's history of the reunification movement.
					 The joint conference was the first pan-national meeting after Korea's liberation from Japan's colonial rule, in which representatives of political parties and social organizations in the north and south of the country set together to discuss the common measures of the nation and reach the identity of view and action.
					
					 In September 1945 the U.S. imperialists set their feet in south Korea as "liberator" to turn it into their colony. And they brought the Korean issue to the UN to adopt an illegal "decision" on having "separate elections" in south Korea. 
					
					 After all, the Korean nation was standing at the crossroads of reunification or division. 
					
					 At this crucial time, President Kim Il Sung at the presidium meeting of the C.C., Democratic National United Front of North Korea proposed the Joint Conference in order to foil the U.S. moves for aggression and national division and set up a united democratic central government by concerted efforts of patriotic forces in the north and the south of the country. 
					
					 The proposal was fully approved and hailed by political parties, groups and personages of different walks of life in the north and the south of Korea.
					
					 In April Juche 37 (1948) the Joint Conference took place in Pyongyang, attended by 695 representatives of 56 political parties and social organizations from the north and the south. 
					
					 Making a historic report at the Conference, Kim Il Sung set forth immediate tasks facing the Korean nation on the basis of a profound analysis of the prevailing political situation in the country.
					
					 All the participants in the Conference reached a complete consensus on all its agenda items to meet the great expectation of the entire nation.
					
					 The successful Conference, a good model of great national unity, was thanks to the energetic efforts and patriotic devotion of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Hit for Dreaming Provocation of War on DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Hit for Dreaming Provocation of War on DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Chief of the security room of Chongwadae of south Korea Kim Jang Su at a "National Assembly" session cried out for "making punishment by employing every possible means" while becoming vocal about "provocation by the north". This was not just his private opinion but reflected the idea of the chief of Chongwadae, says Minju Joson Tuesday in a bylined commentary.
					 The present south Korean authorities are inciting all-out confrontation with fellow countrymen at the instigation of the U.S. imperialists, the news analyst says, and goes on:
					
					 Kim Jang Su formerly served as minister of puppet Defense. He has been deeply engaged himself in confrontation with fellow countrymen and DPRK-targeted war drills.
					
					 His provocative remarks proved that the puppet south Korean regime's "proposal for dialogue" was nothing but a crafty trick to mislead the public opinion. The south Korean puppet regime which waged huge war drills against the DPRK with the U.S. imperialists made the dialogue offer to shift the blame for the strained situation on the Korean Peninsula on to the DPRK. 
					
					 The puppet forces made the dialogue offer on one hand and went berserk, hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK on the Day of the Sun widely celebrated by the world on the other hand. Not content with this, they instigated such belligerent guys as Kim Jang Su to vociferate about "provocation by the north" and "punishment". This proves their sordid nature of crying wine and selling vinegar. Their intention is to rattle the DPRK and secure a pretext for provoking a total war against it.
					
					 The warmongers' remarks of further aggravating the north-south ties have touched off greater anger of the army and people of the DPRK. They have turned out in an all-out action against the U.S., determined to mercilessly punish the puppet warmongers who seek the provocation of a war against the DPRK.

articles.title: Candlelight Rally for Peace on Korean Peninsula Held in S. Korea
articles.content:
Candlelight Rally for Peace on Korean Peninsula Held in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- A candlelight rally for achieving the peace on the Korean Peninsula was held in Kwangju, south Korea on April 19 under the sponsorship of the Emergency Situation Council for Defusing Danger of War and Achieving Peace on Korean Peninsula.
					 Present there were people from all walks of life in Kwangju City and South Jolla Province.
					
					 The participants condemned the U.S. for increasing the danger of a nuclear war.
					
					 They can not feel sincerity at all though the U.S. is talking about dialogue as regards the situation on the Korean Peninsula, they charged.
					
					 The ardent desire of the people is to achieve peace on the peninsula at an early date, they held.
					
					 They declared they would turn out in actions to remove the ever-mounting danger of war and lead a peaceful life.
					
					At the end of the rally the participants staged a demonstration.

articles.title: Earthquake Hits S. Korea
articles.content:
Earthquake Hits S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Two earthquakes occurred in waters 101 km northwest of Huksan-myon, Sinan County, South Jolla Province of south Korea on Sunday, south Korean KBS reported.
					 There was 4.9-magnitude seismic event that morning and an aftershock after ten hours.
					
					 It was reported that vibration of buildings was felt in Kwangju City, South Jolla and South Chungchong provinces and some areas of Kyonggi Province.

articles.title: News Analyst on U.S.-S. Korea Dangerous War Scenarios
articles.content:
News Analyst on U.S.-S. Korea Dangerous War Scenarios
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean military is seeking to include what is called "scorched-land strategy" in OPLAN 5015, a new war scenario against the DPRK, at the instigation of the U.S. imperialists.
					 OPLAN 5015 is a combination of OPLAN 5026, the keynote of which is to mount a preemptive nuclear strike on the DPRK, and OPLAN 5027, the main contents of which are to deploy the U.S. "rapid deterrent forces" on the Korean Peninsula, destroy the "strategic targets in the north," land huge troops on the coast of the DPRK, "occupy it by force" and set up a "ruling machinery" in it. Accordingly, this plan is aimed to let the U.S. forces present in south Korea and the south Korean puppet army deal a "preemptive strike" at the DPRK and occupy Pyongyang in a short time without any reinforcement from the U.S. mainland.
					
					 The south Korean forces are mulling adding the "strategy for making havoc of the north Korean army" to such dangerous OPLAN 5015. This is tantamount to an open declaration of war against the DPRK and goes to clearly prove the absurdity of their call for "end to threat and provocation by the north", raised by the U.S. and the puppets in south Korea as preconditions for dialogue.
					
					 It is an open secret that the U.S. has long schemed to unleash a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula. This is clearly evidenced by its dangerous war scenarios, which have been steadily modified and supplemented every year.
					
					 Right after the adoption of the Korean Armistice Agreement, the U.S. imperialists loudly spoke in public that it suffered a defeat in the Korean War because it did not use A-bombs. And they drew up all kinds of nuclear war scenarios intended to provoke another Korean war, which include "8-53" and "10-54" in the mid-1950s, "9-day war plan" in the 1970s, "3-day war plan" and "120-day war plan" in the 1980s and OPLAN 5027 and OPLAN 5027-98 in the 1990s.
					
					 In the new century, they listed the DPRK as an "axis of evil" and worked out and modified a number of DPRK-targeted war scenarios, including OPLAN 5027-04 and OPLAN 5030.
					
					 Such nuclear war scenarios are becoming a reality through annual DPRK-targeted military drills of various forms in south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists had staged war drills on more than 13 700 occasions till 2007, among them being at least 900 joint military exercises conducted in league with the south Korean forces and 2 400 odd drills of services and arms by the U.S. troops single-handedly.
					
					 It is needless to say that the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises, now being conducted by the U.S. and south Korea for nearly two months, are a test nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					 All the facts clearly show that the U.S. is the very one who is escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula and bringing the danger of war to it while wrecking its peace.

articles.title: News Analyst Dismisses U.S. Call for Negotiation as Ploy
articles.content:
U.S. Call for Negotiations Is Ploy: News Analyst
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The United States and the south Korean authorities have recently pretended to be interested in dialogue and negotiations with the DPRK. But such behavior is aimed only to evade their responsibility for the present crisis on the Korean Peninsula.
					 Down through history, the call for dialogue on the part of the U.S. was a ploy to mislead the international community.
					
					 When the Bush administration appeared in the U.S., the DPRK government proposed direct talks for peace on the peninsula several times, strongly urging the settlement of the nuclear issue through conclusion of a nonaggression treaty.
					
					 However, the U.S. insisted on "nuclear program renouncement first, dialogue later", raising preconditions that the DPRK should refrain from nuclear proliferation, dismantle its long-range missiles, slacken the intimidatory posture of conventional armed forces and fully comply with the safeguards accord under the Non-proliferation Treaty. 
					
					 It went the lengths of asserting that any progress in the DPRK-U.S. talks entirely depends on the former's attitude towards the key problems and that the talks would focus only on the performance of its obligation. Their assertion was little different from the U.S. refusal to have talks with the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. rhetoric about dialogue in 2006 was no more than a smokescreen to cover up its intention to stifle the DPRK. Just after an agreement on the resumption of the six-party talks, the U.S. launched "reception, staging, onward movement and integration" (RSOI) exercises, driving the talks into total collapse.
					
					 At present the U.S. cries out for starting dialogue in an appropriate environment, in an appropriate time and under appropriate condition, urging the DPRK to stop the "provocative" remarks and show its will to realize denuclearization and suspend missile launch.
					
					 Such gangster-like logic can never work on anyone as the DPRK and the U.S. are in hostile relationship and the latter is the very one that pushed the Korean Peninsula to such a touch-and-go situation as now.

articles.title: British Organizations Urge S. Korean Authorities to Stop Hostile Acts against DPRK
articles.content:
British Organizations Urge S. Korean Authorities to Stop Hostile Acts against DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association made public a joint statement on Apr. 17, urging the south Korean authorities to stop hostile acts against the DPRK.
					 The statement said unpardonable is the south Korean puppet regime's act of hurling the anti-DPRK gangsters into hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 Such a provocative act amounts to a thrice-cursed crime as it was committed at a time when all the Koreans were celebrating the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung), the statement said.
					
					 The Day of the Sun is an auspicious day significantly celebrated not only by the Korean people but by the world progressives and followers of the Juche idea, it added.
					
					 The above-said crime committed by the south Korean human scum is a serious insult to the progressive mankind, the statement noted.
					
					 It demanded the regime severely punish the chief culprits.
					
					 It was just that the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army declared in its ultimatum that it would take a retaliatory counteraction without notice, the statement said, adding:
					
					 If the south Korean puppet regime has true intention of dialogue and negotiations, it has to immediately stop the hostile acts against the DPRK and punish the criminals. It should also apologize for its acts.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as NDC Chairman Marked by Britons
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as NDC Chairman Marked by Britons 
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association marked the 20th anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					 They released a joint statement on April 7.
					
					 The statement said Kim Jong Il was elected chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission on April 9, 20 years ago.
					
					 This was an expression of all the Korean people's absolute trust in him, the statement said.
					
					 It added that he wisely led the cause of army-building of Juche and formulated the Songun politics as a basic political mode under socialism.
					
					 Toward the end of the last century he defended socialism despite the worst adversity blamed on the imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK and a succession of natural disasters that hit the country, demonstrating the dignity and honor of Korea, the statement stressed, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Il also brought about a great victory in the battle minus gunfire with the U.S. imperialists who tried to stifle the DPRK over its nuclear issue.
					
					 It was thanks to his wise guidance that the DPRK could emerge as a military power and a nuclear weapons state.
					
					 He is alive as eternal chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission for his huge exploits, the statement said.
					
					 It expressed deep respects to him.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded by Organizations of Czech Republic, Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded by Organizations of Czech Republic, Mexico
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Organizations of the Czech Republic and Mexico issued bulletins on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association carried an article titled "Thunder of the DPRK" in the special issue of its bulletin on April 14.
					
					 In an article "The eternal sun of Juche" the bulletin said:
					
					 The Korean people are praising Kim Il Sung, founder of socialist Korea, as the eternal sun of Juche.
					
					 He provided the great guiding idea for realizing independence by founding the Juche idea.
					
					 Therefore, an independent era in which the people open up their destiny by themselves was unfolded.
					
					 He will live forever as the eternal sun of Juche in the hearts of the world progressives.
					
					 The Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea on April 9 carried an article praising him for performing immortal feats for the country, people, era and the revolution.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by British Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by British Organizations
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association issued a joint statement on April 12 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The statement said his life was a noble life of a great leader of people and a peerless leader.
					
					 After embarking on the road of the revolution in his early years, he waged hard-fought anti-Japanese armed struggle and liberated the Korean nation from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule and built a socialist country for the people, a country strong in the sense of independence, the statement said.
					
					 It added that he founded the great Juche idea and brilliantly embodied it in the whole period of leading the revolution and construction. He built a socialist system centered on the popular masses and strengthened and developed it, the statement stressed.
					
					 Regarding it as his maxim to believe in the people as in Heaven, he put the demands and interests of the people above all and rendered devoted services for the people's happiness, it noted, adding that under his loving care the Korean people could lead an independent, creative and happy life as a big harmonious family.
					
					 His great feats will shine long along with the invincible might of Juche Korea that is making victorious progress under the Songun leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, the statement stressed.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked in Different Countries
						
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was marked in Uganda, Nigeria, Guinea, Tunisia and the Czech Republic from April 12 to 16. They held meetings, lectures, seminars, photo exhibitions and film shows.
					 Displayed at their venues were photos showing immortal feats performed by the President, general secretary Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Korean films shown included "The Tower of the Juche Idea" and "The Arch of Triumph."
					
					 The department director of the Ugandan presidency said in his speech at a meeting that Kim Il Sung was a close friend who extended warm support and solidarity to the Ugandan people in their efforts for liberation and the building of new society.
					
					 Alhassan, administration director of the Niger State Government of Nigeria, said at a meeting that the birth anniversary of the President is a world holiday for which the world progressives could usher in the new era of independence.
					
					 Secouna Camara, director general of the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea, in a lecture titled "Great Man Kim Il Sung" praised him for performing immortal feats on behalf of the era and history.
					
					 The chairman of the Tunisian preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun said the feats and noble life of the President would always be remembered by not only the Korean people but the world progressives.

articles.title: U.S. Will Again Suffer Defeat: Nepali Paper
articles.content:
U.S. Will Again Suffer Defeat: Nepali Paper
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- A Nepalese paper carried an article titled "Danger of war on the Korean Peninsula, patriotism of the Korean people" on April 13.
					 The paper said:
					
					 The Korean people are sure of their strength.
					
					 They are indomitable people who do not tolerate any other's intervention and the Korean nation is a brave one which has overcome trials.
					
					 The Korean people with the Juche idea as their guiding idea neither yielded to the "sanctions" by the U.S. and its allies nor bent their knees before big powers with their dignity and sovereignty violated.
					
					 The world people are watching the people of the DPRK as they are overcoming all sorts of hardships, united close around their leader, despite the pressure by big powers and the "sanctions" by the UN Security Council.
					
					 The U.S. worked out a strategy on invasion against the DPRK long ago but has not yet put it in practice.
					
					 What is more amazing is that the DPRK has taken toughest measures in succession for sovereignty in response to the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills.
					
					 The U.S. will again suffer a bitter defeat by the just Korean people.
					
					 The DPRK will never step back in their struggle to protect its dignity and independence.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK Moves of U.S. Denounced by French, Russian Figures
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK Moves of U.S. Denounced by French, Russian Figures
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- French and Russian figures denounced the U.S. moves to stifle the DPRK.
					 The secretary general of the France-Korea Friendship Association said as follows when interviewed by Voice of Russia on April 5:
					
					 Recently the western media are misleading the public opinion, claiming that the DPRK is intentionally straining the situation.
					
					 This is nothing but a foolish attempt to falsify the essence of the situation.
					
					 The DPRK has strong military muscle which is aimed to foil the invasion by the U.S. to all intents and purposes.
					
					 It is quite natural that the DPRK defends its sovereignty in reliance on its powerful nuclear deterrence to cope with the threats by the U.S. which has introduced latest war hardware including the nuclear-capable strategic bombers after deploying huge aggression forces in south Korea.
					
					 Danger of the Korean Peninsula is not caused by the DPRK but by the U.S. which is seeking to strategically dominate the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 The DPRK, therefore, could not but take the option of bolstering up its nuclear deterrent.
					
					 The Korean people are wishing for peaceful reunification.
					
					 The detente of the Korean Peninsula depends on the U.S. retraction of its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The editor-in-chief of the Russian paper Zavtra at a press conference on April 3 fully supported the line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and build-up of nuclear force set forth at the March, 2013 plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Condemning the U.S. moves of increasing the danger of a nuclear war on the peninsula, the editor-in-chief praised the DPRK as the only country standing firm against the U.S. which styles itself the world's "only super power."

articles.title: DPRK's Nuclear Deterrent Hailed by Swedish Political Party
articles.content:
DPRK's Nuclear Deterrent Hailed by Swedish Political Party
						
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The 15th issue of Proretaren, organ of the Communist Party in Sweden, carried an article supporting the Songun politics and nuclear program of the DPRK.
					 The paper said in an article titled "Peace and nuclear bomb" that the western media are vocal about the nuclear threat from the DPRK on a daily basis but in fact they know well that the DPRK could not have gotten rid of the same lot as what was met by Iraq and Libya if it failed to have access to the nuclear weapons.
					
					 But for the Songun politics and nuclear deterrent of the DPRK, peace would not have been ensured on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Those countries which pin hope on "good faith" and "eternal solidarity" touted by the enemies are bound to meet a tragic fate like Yugoslavia, Iraq and Libya. 
					
					 The protection of sovereignty that is provided for in the UN Charter is mere words on a paper.
					
					 This time the world appears to have been saved by the nuclear deterrent of the DPRK.
					
					 Otherwise, the U.S. might have ignited a nuclear war.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Finland
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Finland
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "On Effecting a Drastic Turn in Land Management to Meet the Requirements for Building a Thriving Socialist Nation" was brought out in pamphlet by the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea.
					 The work, published on April 27, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the undying feats by President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il in land management. It also expounds the general direction and ways for face-lifting the land of the country as befits a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place in Helsinki on April 10.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Report at WPK Plenary Meeting Carried by Foreign Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Report at WPK Plenary Meeting Carried by Foreign Newspaper
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The Namibian newspaper New Era on April 15 carried the full text of the report made by the respected Kim Jong Un at the March, 2013 plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Clarified in the report made on March 31 are a new strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and building of nuclear force as required by the prevailing situation and the developing revolution, and tasks and ways for realizing it.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe felicitacion de Cuerpo de Agregados Militares
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe felicitacion de Cuerpo de Agregados Militares
 Pyongyang, 23 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio un cesto de flores y una carta de felicitacion que le dedicara el Cuerpo de Agregados Militares en Corea con motivo del 81o aniversario de la fundacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea. 
					 El agregado militar irani Hassan Reza Husseini, quien preside el cuerpo, los entrego el dia 23 al general de ejercito del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Kim Kyok Sik, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares. 
					
					 Por otra parte, fueron entregadas a un funcionario coreano las cartas de felicitacion dirigidas al Mariscal por los agregados militares de Cuba, Iran, Vietnam, Egipto y China, respectivamente.

articles.title: Mal juicio de EE.UU, le traera la derrota historica, comenta ACNC
articles.content:
Mal juicio de EE.UU, le traera la derrota historica, comenta ACNC
 Pyongyang, 23 de abril (ACNC) -- En estos dias, Estados Unidos habla tanto del "juicio peligroso" y "conducta imprudente" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en cuanto a la situacion actual de la Peninsula Coreana, diciendo que la propuesta de dialogo de si mismo es para prevenir la consecuencia catastrofica y refleja la demanda de la region y de la sociedad internacional. 
					 En otras palabras, las medidas superintransigentes de la RPDC son "actos imprudentes" basados en el juicio malintencionado y por eso, EE.UU. hace esfuerzos por salvar la situacion. 
					
					 Esto es una artimana astuta para aumentar el ambiente de aplastamiento a la RPDC poniendo de relieve el "caracter belicoso" de esta. 
					
					 La politica sobre la RPDC de EE.UU. se basa en la ignorancia a su rival y en el juicio erroneo sobre las correlaciones politicas y militares cambiadas de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					 EE.UU. no sabe de la unidad monolitica y el poderio de la RPDC donde estan unidos compactamente el ejercito y el pueblo en torno al lider con la unica alma y proposito. 
					
					 Cree que podria derrocar el regimen norcoreano con la invasion armada basada en el chantaje con bombas atomicas, la ofensiva ideologica y cultural para la "desinformacion interior" y la sancion economica. Pero, esta politica exterior del imperio no surte efecto nunca mas en la RPDC. 
					
					 Bajo la bandera de la independencia y el Songun, la RPDC ya se ha convertido en la potencia politica y militar y el pueblo coreano exalta el poderio como pueblo independiente a quien nadie se atreve a atacar. 
					
					 Y la RPDC tiene abundantes experiencias y la tradicion historica de haber logrado siempre victorias en la confrontacion antiyanqui. 
					
					 La Peninsula Coreana no es la de ayer, aunque es invariable su posicion geografica. 
					
					 En particular, la posesion de armas nucleares de la RPDC modifico completamente las correlaciones politicas y militares en esta region incluso la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					 Ya se acabo el estado de desequilibrio nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del Nordeste Asiatico, gracias a lo cual se ha reducido notablemente el peligro de estallido de guerra. 
					
					 Ahora la RPDC puede tomar cualesquier medidas intransigentes fisicas para preservar la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					 Al contrario, la politica de EE.UU. sobre la RPDC tiene en consideracion el tiempo antes de la posesion de armas nucleares de la RPDC. Pues, no tiene algun cambio tanto en su esencia como en su medio y metodo.
					
					 Es anacronica la politica norteamericana de apoderarse de toda la Peninsula Coreana al derrocar el regimen norcoreano con la invasion armada segun el chantaje de bombas nucleares y la campana ideo-cultural para la "desintegracion interior". 
					
					 Esta politica exterior de EE.UU. no surte efecto nunca mas en la RPDC, pais con armas nucleares y con abundantes experiencias y la tradicion historica de haber logrado siempre victorias en la confrontacion antiyanqui.
					
					 La tragedia de EE.UU. esta en no saber nada de la RPDC ni de la realidad objetiva.
					
					 Aunque sea ahora, el imperio norteamericano debe abandonar la caduca politica sobre la RPDC. 
					
					 El mal juicio de EE.UU. le traera la derrota nunca vista en la historia. 
					
					 La actual administracion norteamericana debe sacar la leccion en la confesion de sus antecesores quienes dijeron que la guerra coreana de hace 60 anos fue una contienda erronea.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia Kim Jang Su y otros belicistas surcoreanos
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia Kim Jang Su y otros belicistas surcoreanos
 Pyongyang, 23 de abril (ACNC) -- El jefe del gabinete de seguridad de Chongwadae, Kim Jang Su, en la "Asamblea Nacional" dijo que "el Sur de Corea castigara con todos los medios posibles a la provocacion del Norte (de Corea)", lo cual no es la opinion de un individuo sino la voluntad de la duena de Chongwadae.
					 Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual de este martes y continua:
					
					 Las autoridades actuales persiguen la confrontacion total con los connacionales bajo la instigacion de Estados Unidos.
					
					 Kim, ex ministro de Defensa Nacional titere, estuvo en la delantera de la confrontacion fratricida y acostumbrado en los ejercicios de guerra anti-RPDC.
					
					 Su disparate provocativo demostro que la "propuesta de dialogo" de los titeres es una vil artimana para desviar la opinion publica.
					
					 Los titeres surcoreanos, que han llevado al estado del tiempo de guerra la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana librando junto con EE.UU. los ejercicios de guerra anti-RPDC de gran envergadura, presentaron la "propuesta de dialogo" para imputar a otro la responsabilidad de la situacion creada hoy.
					
					 Los titeres presentan la "propuesta de dialogo" mientras ofenden en el Dia del Sol la maxima dignidad de la RPDC. No satisfecho con esto hablan de la "provocacion del Norte" y la "represalia" instigando a los maniacos como Kim.
					
					 El intento de ellos es buscar a toda costa el pretexto de la provocacion de guerra total anti-RPDC ofendiendo a esta.
					
					 El disparate de los belicistas suscita la colera del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea.
					
					 El ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC levantados en el combate de enfrentamiento antiyanqui castigaran rotundamente a los belicistas titeres surcoreanos que suenan con desatar la guerra anti-RPDC en adhesion a EE.UU.

articles.title: Delegaciones del pueblo visitan unidades del EPC
articles.content:
Delegaciones del pueblo visitan unidades del EPC
 Pyongyang, 23 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 81o aniversario de la fundacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea, las delegaciones del pueblo visitaron las unidades del EPC.
					 Les acogieron con efusivos aplausos en las unidades los oficiales y soldados del EPC y los familiares de militares.
					
					 Fueron entregados a los militares los regalos enviados por el Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Al ver a los militares que defienden la linea avanzada por la defensa de la patria, los visitantes sintieron otra vez que gracias a tener al heroico EPC fortalecido como ejercito revolucionario invencible en el regazo de los Generalisimos, se garantiza el radiante porvenir de la Corea del Sol.
					
					 Ellos les transmitieron la noticia de retaguardia y entregaron los articulos de ayuda.
					
					 Les encomendaron que sean verdaderos soldados que se sacrifiquen sin vacilacion por defender al Comandante Supremo, la patria y el pueblo.
					
					 Recorrieron las salas de educacion, los cuarteles, los restaurantes, las granjas ganaderas, los invernaderos, etc., realizaron los juegos deportivos y de recreo y cantaron junto con los militares.
